alert.note: Alert for Adams (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued June 12 at 2:27PM MDT until June 12 at 3:15PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 315 PM MDT FOR NORTH CENTRAL ADAMS COUNTY... At 225 PM MDT, a confirmed tornado was located 6 miles southeast of Lochbuie, or 22 miles northeast of Denver, moving northeast at 10 mph. The tornado has lifted, but circulation and another potential tornado may be developing just to the north. HAZARD...TORNADO. SOURCE...Trained Spotter confirmed tornado. IMPACT...Expect damage to mobile homes, roofs, and vehicles. This tornadic thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of north central Adams County. TORNADO...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN
info.instruction: To repeat, a tornado is on the ground. TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
